title: Chocolate chia pudding
steps: Mix all the ingredients in a big bowl
Add a pinch of salt
Whisk to combine the ingredients
Cover with a plastic film and leave for 4 hrs in the fridge
Pour the mix in small glasses
Add frozen berries and cacao powder
enjoy

title: Vegan brownies
steps: Heat oven to 170C/150C and grease and line a 20cm square tin with baking parchment.
Combine the flaxseed with 6 tbsp water and set aside for at least 5 mins
Melt 120g chocolate and margarine with 60ml water on  low heat. Allow to cool slightly.
Put the flour, almonds, cocoa, baking powder and ¼ tsp salt in a bowl and stir to remove any lumps.
Mix the sugar into the melted chocolate mixture, and beat well until a smooth mix is formed
Stir in the flaxseed mixture, vanilla extract and remaining chocolate, then add the flour mixture.
Bake for 35-45 mins
Allow to cool in the tin completely, then cut into squares.
Enjoy
suggestions: Eat the brownies within three days.

title: Buffalo Cauliflower Bites
ingredients: ⅓ cup hot sauce or barbecue sauce
steps: Cut the cauliflower into florets
Preheat oven to 232°C. Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper.
Combine the tomato paste, garlic powder, onion powder, brown rice flour, almond flour, paprika, parsley, and ⅔ cup of water in a blender. Mix until the batter is smooth and thick.
Add the batter to a bowl and add the cauliflower
Mix until the cauliflowers are well covered with the batter
Lay the cauliflower in a single layer on the baking sheets, make sure that there is some space between the cauliflower florets.
Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, until the cauliflowers are crispy, let them cool down after
Put the florets to a bowl and mix with the sauce.
Enjoy

title: Vegan Corn Cream
steps: Chop the carrots,onion and celery
Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Stir in onions and celery and cook until the onions are golden
Stir in carrots and garlic until garlic is golden.
At the same time, bring water to a boil over high heat and add the cubes of boullion
When bouillon cubes have dissolved, add corn and the vegetables from the pan.
Cook until vegetables are tender. If required add water.
Reduce heat to low, and pour 1 cup soy/almond milk.
Stir soup well and add the second cup of soy/almond milk.
Quickly whisk in flour. Stir in and add parsley, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Keep stirring all the time, until chowder thickens, it takes aroun 15 to 25 minutes.
Enjoy

title: Thai Sweet Potato Noodle Bowl
ingredients: 2 medium sweet potatoes, spiralized into noodles
steps: Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a large skillet over medium-high
Add sweet potato noodles, bell pepper, and 1/2 teaspoon salt; fry for 5 minutes.
Add half cup water; cover and cook 3 minutes.
Add tofu and spinach; fry for 4 minutes.
Combine remaining salt, coconut milk and curry paste in a bowl.
Serve with lime wedges
Enjoy

title: Carrot Ginger Salad
steps: Peel and cut the carrots in the shape of stick
Fry the sesame seeds for 2-3 minutes until lightly toasted, then set aside
Mix the lemon juice, peanut oil, sesame oil, ginger in a cup; then add salt and pepper
Combine the toasted sesame seeds, carrot and bean sprouts in a medium bowl. Pour the dressing
Enjoy

title: Blueberry Smoothie
ingredients: 1 ½ cups to 2 cups unsweetened almond milk
steps: Combine all of the ingredients
Stop to scrape down the sides
add more milk if necessary.
Enjoy

title: Vegan strawberry porridge
steps: Combine the oats and milk in a pot
Cook gently for 10 minutes in medium-low heat,stir constantly
add a pinch of salt and serve it with the strawberries
Enjoy

title: Roasted chickpeas
steps: Preheat oven 23 degrees C
Drain and dry the chickpeas with paper towl.
Put the chickpeas in a bowl and add olive oil
Season to taste with salt and cayenne pepper
spread the chickpeas in trail cover with baking sheet
bake for around 30-40 minutes until they are crunchy
Enjoy
suggestions: Drain really well the chickpeas for a crunchy touch

title: Chickpeas pesto pasta
steps: Bring water with salt to boil and cook the pasta for 10 - 15 min
Meanwhile, drain  and rinse the chickpeas
Chop the onion and the chickpeas
Fry the chickpeas and onion for 5 min
Add pesto, salt, pepper and lemon juice
When the pasta is ready, drain the water and add it to the frying pan
Mix everything and cook for 5 more minutes
Enjoy

title: Vegan pesto pasta
steps: Bring water with salt to boil and cook the pasta for 10 - 15 min
While cooking the pasta, in a frying pan olive oil and tomatoes, stir occasionally
When the pasta is ready, add it to the frying pan
Add  pesto, salt and pepper to taste
Mix well all the ingredients
Add vegan parmesan cheese when serving
Enjoy

title: Carrot smoothie
steps: Peel and chop carrots in small pieces
Add the carrots, soy yogurt and sugar to the blender
Blend till all the ingredients are mixed
Enjoy
suggestions: Add some soy milk if the smoothie is thick

title: Avocado toast
steps: Toast 2 slices of bread in a toaster
Meanwhile in a bowl mash the avocado
Add cilantro, lemon juice, a pinch of salta and a pinch of pepper
Mix all the ingredients
Spread the avocado to the bread
Enjoy

title: Hummus
steps: Drain and rince the chickpeas
Add the chickpeas,garlic,lemon juice, a big pinch of salt, pepper and olive oil to a food processor
Blend until well combined
Taste and add more lemon juice, pepper or salt
Enjoy
suggestions: If the hummus is a bit dry, add a bit of water while blending the ingredients

title: Oven roasted sweet potato
steps: Peel the sweet potatoes
Cut the sweet potatoes in bite size pieces.
Add the sweet potato bites on an owen plate.
Cover them with olive oil using a cooking brush.
Spice with salt, garlic powder and oregano.
Cook in oven for 20 minutes.
Enjoy
suggestions: Serve with hummus or guacamole.

title: Smoky tomato and red pepper soup
steps: Roast tomatoes and peppers in oven until soft.
Add roasted tomatoes and peppers in blender with 1 can of crushed tomatoes
Add vegetable broth, garlic and spices and blend
Add to a kettle and boil until hot.
Check taste and add salt if necessary.
Cook in oven for 20 minutes.
Enjoy
suggestions: Serve with fried vegetables and mushrooms and/or freshly baked bread.

title: DIY Fruitcocktail
steps: Cut all fruits in roughly the same size pieces.
Mix orange juice, the juice of a half lemon and maple syrup together in a bowl.
Pour the juice and maple syrup mix on the fruits and mix well with a spoon.
Enjoy
suggestions: Serve with vegan ice cream, chia pudding or plant yoghurt.

title: Guacamole
steps: In a bowl mash the avocados and add lime juice
Cut the onion into small pieces
Add the chopped onion to the bowl; Add salt and cilantro
Mix all the ingredients
Enjoy
suggestions: Add 1/2 or 1 chopped  jalapeño if you want a spicy guacamole

title: Green Chickpea Salad
steps: Cut the avocado in slices
Dice the cucumber
Drain and rinse the chickpeas with water
Mix all the ingredients in a bowl
Add lemon juice, salt and black pepper to taste
Enjoy

title: Beetroot Spinach Salad
steps: Before starting, boil the beetroots for 45 min and then peel them
Cut in cubes the beetroots
Cut the walnuts in small portions
For making the dressing  mix  olive oil, mustard, vinegar, maple syrup, salt and some  pepper
In a large bowl mix the spinach with the dressing
Then add  beetroots and walnuts
Enjoy

title: Carrot coriander soup
steps: Peel and chopp the onion, potato and carrots
Heat with olive oil the onion for 5 min
Add the potato, carrots and season with gorund coriander, cook for another 5 min
Pour the vegetable stock,bring to boil and the reduce the temperature
Cover and cook for around 15 - 20 min
Cool down a bit the soup;then pour it in a food processor with the coriander
Mix until smooth and return the purée to the pan
Cook for 5 more min and season with salt
Serve and garnish the soup with coriander leaves and pumpkin seeds
Enjoy
suggestions: stir ocasionally while cooking the vegetables in the oven

title: Roasted Root Vegetables
ingredients: 1 head garlic, cloves peeled and separated
steps: Preheat the oven 220 degrees Celsius and place 1 baking sheets with parchment paper.
Peel the beets, carrots and sweet potatoes; then cut them in small pieces (3cm)
Cut the onion in slices
Place all the vegetables in a backing sheets. Drizzle with olive oil.
Season with salt,pepper and rosemary
Roast the vegetables for 45 min until they are tender
For making the dressing  mix  olive oil, mustard, vinegar, maple syrup, salt and some  pepper
Enjoy
suggestions: stir ocasionally while cooking the vegetables in the oven

title: Strawberry French toast
steps: Mix in a bowl the vanilla extract, cinamon, almond milk and maple syrup
Heat the frying pan for 5 min and grease with 1 tbsp of vegan butter
Dip each bread slice in the mix for 20 seconds per side
Place the bread in the frying pan and cook until it is brown and crispy, around 3 minutes per side
Cut the strawberries in half
Serve the french toasts with the stawberries
Enjoy

title: Green Smoothie
ingredients: 1 ½ cups to 2 cups unsweetened almond milk
steps: Cut the banana in slices
Add all the ingredients to the blender and mix well
Enjoy
suggestions: if the smoothie is too thick, add more almond milk

title: Pasta Bolognese
steps: Heat oil in a pan and add onion,garlic celery, mushrooms and carrots; cook for 8 min
Add lentils and tomato purée and cook for 15 min; then spice the sauce with oregano and salt
Meanwhile cook the pasta with salt water
When the pasta is ready drain the water for 40 - 50 min
Serve the pasta with the tomato sauce
Enjoy

title: Chocolate Banana Smoothie
steps: Cut the banana in slices
Add the banana, milk, maple syrup and cocoa powder to the blender
Serve with some flax seeds and almond flakes
Enjoy

title: Chickpea Tomato Pasta
steps: Boil water with salt.
Heat olive oil on a pan.
Chop onion and garlic into small pieces and add to the pan. Fry for 2 minutes.
Chop kale and add to the pan. Cook until it loses its texture.
Chop zucchini and and red pepper in small same size pieces and add to the pan. Fry 2 minutes.
Chop tomatoes in small pieces and add to the pan. Cook until they lose their texture.
Add canned tomatoes and stir. Add spices according to your liking.
Enjoy
suggestions: Serve with a glass of organic red wine and freshly baked bread with olive oil and seasalt.

title: High Protein Blueberry Banana Smoothie
steps: Add all ingredients to a blender and blend.
Enjoy

title: Tofu Noodle Wok
steps: Boil water and add water to a bowl with salt and noodles.
Heat pan with a small amount of olive oil.
Dry tofu with a paper towel and cut into cubes.
Add tofu to the heated pan with sliced onion and mashed garlic. Fry 2 minutes.
Cut all vegetables into same size slices so they cook evenly. Add vegetables to the pan. Fry 5 minutes.
Spice tofu and vegetables with sesame oil, soy sauce, lemon juice, ginger and turmeric.
Remove noodles from water and add them to the pan. Mix with tofu and vegetables.
Add sweet chili sauce and mix one more time.
Remove noodles from water and add them to the pan. Mix with tofu and vegetables.
Enjoy
suggestions: Serve with fresh coriander or thai basil.

title: Sweet Potato Coconut Curry Soup
steps: Peel and cut the sweet potatoes and onion in small pieces
Heat the coconut oil in a large pot.Fry the onion untill golden
Add the garlic to the pot and cook for a minute
Add ginger, turmeric and masala
Add the sweet potato, vegetable stock and coconut milk
Bring to simmer and cook for 20 minutes or until the sweet potato is soft
Blend the soup with a hand blender until creamy
Add lemon juice, salt and pepper to taste
Enjoy
suggestions: Add some chili powder for some heat

title: Hummus Quesadilla
steps: Heat olive oil in a frying pan and saute the garlic and the red pepper
Add the baby spinach and season with salt and pepper, cook for 3 minutes and remove from heat
In another frying pan heat vegan butter and fry the tortilla
On one half of the tortilla add and spread the hummus and the spinach red pepper mix
Fold the tortilla and frying till the tortilla is a bit brown on bottom side
Flip the tortilla and fry the remaining side
Enjoy
suggestions: Add some chili  for some heat

title: Mango Banana Smoothie
steps: Add all the ingredients in a blender and mix
add more milk if necessary.
Enjoy

title: Tofu Scramble with Veggies
steps: Chop the onion, red bell pepper, zucchini and garlic in small pieces
Crumble the tofu using a fork or with your hands
Add olive oil to the frying pan, fry the onion and garlic for few minutes
Add the zucchini and red bell pepper, cook for some minutes
Add crumble tofu and almond milk,stir and cook for around 8 minutes
Season with salt,black pepper and turmeric
Enjoy
suggestions: serve with homemade hummus

title: Fava bean Hummus Taco
ingredients: 250gr minced fava bean or other mock meat
1/2 - 1 teaspoon of smoked red chilli powder
steps: Chop the onion, kale and garlic in small pieces;add to frying pan and cook for 2 minutes
Add minced fava bean to the frying pan and cook for 2 more minutes
Season with cilantro, salt, smoked chilli powder and lime juice
Cut the avocado, tomato and spinach in small slices
Warm the tortillas for 15 seconds in microwave or frying pan
Add the minced fava bean, chopped vegetables and hummus on the tortilla
Enjoy
suggestions: serve with chilli sauce, fresh cilantro and lime

title: Vegan Energy Ball
steps: Add oat flakes, ground flaxseed, sunflower seeds, pumpkin seeds, cocoa powder and a pinch of salt  to a bowl and mix
Melt peanut butter
Add maple syrup with melted peanut butter and mix
Add the peanut butter mix with the dry ingredients and mix well
If the consistency is too dry, add a little bit of water or almond milk
Take a small amount of the mix and make a ball with your hands
Enjoy
suggestions: add coconut flakes for extra flavor

title: Banana Blueberry Porridge
steps: Add 1 dl of oat flakes on a pan
Cut the banana in half and cut it in 0,5 cm slices.
Add banana slices with the oat flakes.
Pour 2.5 dl of almond milk and boil the oat flakes and banana slices together for 5 minutes.
Add a pinch of salt and cinnamon for taste
Enjoy with fresh blueberries

title: Carrot Turmeric Smoothie
steps: Combine all of the ingredients
Add more milk if necessary.
Enjoy

title: Strawberry Avocado Ice cream
steps: Put all the ingredients in a food processor and blend
Pour into cups and cover with a plastic film and freeze
Wait for 10 - 15 minutes
Enjoy

title: Coconut Banana Pancakes
steps: In a bowl mix the flour, baking powder, sugar and salt
Add slowly the coconut milk to the flour and mix until making a smooth batter
Heat a frying pan and add vegetable oil
Pour small portion of the batter to the frying pan and add small pieces of banana
Cook the pancakes
Enjoy
suggestions: Serve with maple syrup

title: Pear Spinach Smoothie
ingredients: 1 small piece of ginger peeled and chopped
steps: Combine all of the ingredients
Add more milk if necessary.
Enjoy

title: Pico de Gallo
steps: Add in a bowl the tomatoes,onion and chilli jalapeño and mix
Season with lime juice and salt
Enjoy

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Mix all the dry ingredients and add almond milk and vanilla extract
Stir until making a dough
Refrigerate the dough for 2 hours
Preheat the oven to 180 degrees Celsius
Make small dough balls and put them in a greased baking tray
Bake for around 15 minutes
Enjoy

title: Strawberry Banana Smoothie
steps: Combine all of the ingredients
Enjoy

title: Strawberry Salad
steps: Wash and chop and strawberries, onion and salad
Toast the nuts in a frying pan for 3 minutes
In a small bowl mix the balsamic vinegar, olive oil, maple syrup, mustard and a pintch of salt
Serve with salad dressing, nuts and black pepper
Enjoy

title: Tofu Scramble Taco
steps: Chop  onion,avocado, tomato, cilantro and chili jalapeno in small pieces
Crumble the tofu using a fork or with your hands
Add olive oil to the frying pan, fry 1/4 of the onion and stir  for few minutes
Add crumble tofu and almond milk,stir and cook for around 8 minutes
Season with salt,black pepper and turmeric
Add the scramble tofu to the tortillas
Serve with the chopped tomato, cilantro, chili jalapeno and onion
Enjoy
suggestions: serve with homemade chili salsa

title: Spinach Soup
steps: Peel and chop in small pieces the onion, garlic and potatoes and wash the spinach leaves
Heat a pan on medium heat, pour olive oil. Add the onion and garlic, stir now and then
When the onion is tender, add the spinach leaves until wilted
Add the vegetable broth and the chopped potatoes and cook for 20 minutes
Pour the soup in a food mixer and blend the ingredients thoroughly
Add salt and pepper to taste
Enjoy
suggestions: serve with homemade chili salsa

title: Peanut Butter Strawberry Bread Slice
steps: Wash  thoroughly the strawberries
Spread the peanut butter evenly onto each bread slice
Cut the strawberries in slices and add them to the bread slice
Enjoy
suggestions: add some banana slices also

title: Chili sin carne
steps: Chop the onion, garlic, red pepper and red chili
Add olive oil to a cooking pot and fried the onion and garlic until softened
Fried the chopped paprika and chili for 5 min
Add the tomato sauce, chipotle sauce and vegetable bouillon
Pour tomato sauce, chipotle sauce and vegetable bouillon and bring to simmer, cook for 25 min
Add the soy mince and beans and pour a little bit of water if it gets thick
Season with salt, coriander, somked paprika and oregano
Enjoy
suggestions: Serve with white rice and cubes of avocado

title: Spinach Apple Salad
steps: Chop the apple and the red onion in fine slices
In a bowl add apple slices,onion slices,  spinach leaves, cranberries and walnuts
For the vinaigrette in a small container add garlic,lemon juice, apple cider vinegar and olive oil
Mix well the vinaigrette and season with salt and pepper
Drizzle the vinaigrette to the salad
Enjoy

title: Spinach Avocado Toast
steps: Wash the spinach leaves
Cut in half the avocado and spread on bread
Season with salt and pepper
Add the spinach leaves
Enjoy
suggestions: You can also add some slices of tomato

title: Creamy Vegan Mushroom Soup
steps: In a cooking pot melt the vegan butter over medium heat
Fry garlic, onion and mushroom
When the mushrooms and onion are soft, add the flour and cook for 1 minute
Pour the vegetable broth and coconut milk and cooki for 20 minutes
Season the soup with thyme leaves, salt and pepper
Enjoy
suggestions: You can also add some slices of tomato

title: Bean and vegetable breakfast pan
steps: Fry onion for 2 minutes in oil.
Add cale and mushrooms and fry 2 minutes.
Add bell pepper and beans and fry 1 minute.
Add chopped tomatoes and spices. Let zimmer for 2 minutes.

title: Bean and tomato toast
steps: Add beans, garlic and avocado in a blender and mix. Add spices and water if needed.
Toast two slices of bread. Cut tomato into thick slices.
Add a thick layer off bean mix on bread and top with tomato slices.
suggestions: Serve with finger salt and fresh herbs

title: Hummus bread
steps: Add chickpeas in a blender.
Add lemon juice, tahini, cumin, garlic and salt and pepper.
Blend until you reach a smooth consistency.
For a different taste and color, add a pinch of curry and curcumin.
Add hummus on bread and serve with vegetables.
suggestions: Serve with finger salt and fresh herbs.

title: Banana blackberry plate
steps: Slice banana and add to the plate
Rinse the blackberries and add to the plate
Enjoy
suggestions: Serve with vegan yoghurt, nuts and oat flakes

title: Zucchini vegetable soup
steps: Boil water with vegetable stock cubes
Skim carrots, potatoes and onions
Chop all vegetables and add in boiling water. Boil until soft
Puree into a soup and add fresh grated garlic, salt, pepper and tarragon. Check taste
Add vegan creme fraiche
Bring to a boil and serve
suggestions: Serve with fresh whole wheat bread

title: Vegetable skewers
steps: Wash zucchini and bell peppers
Chop all vegetables and make skewers
Cover vegetables with oil. Spice with salt, pepper and italian herb mix
Cook for 20min in the oven or grill
suggestions: Serve with hummus, seitan stakes, or grilled mushrooms

title: Parsley smoothie
steps: Mix all ingredients into a smoothie.
Enjoy
suggestions: Serve in a bowl with fresh fruits and berries

title: Maple cinnamon coconut cookies
steps: Mix in a bowl shredded coconut, coconut flour, 1/4 maple syrup, vanilla extract and melted coconut oil
With the dough make small balls
Place them in baking paper in a flat surface and press them to make cookies
For the icing mix in a blender the dates, 1/4 maple syrup, cinnamon and coconut oil
Add the icing to the cookies
Freeze them on the friedge until the cookies are hard
Enjoy
suggestions: Serve in a bowl with fresh fruits and berries

title: Kung pao tofu
steps: Drain the tofu, dried it with a clean paper towel and cut in small cubes
In a small bowl add 2 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp sesame oil, black pepper and the tofu, let it marinate
For the kung pao sauce in a small bowl mix 3 tbsp soy sauce,4 tbsp water, maple syrup and 2 tbsp sesame oil
Add some oil to a wok/saute pan and heat it over medium-heat
Fry the tofu for around 3 minutes and put it on a plate
In the same pan fry the zucchini, ginger, bell peppers,onion and chilli
Then add the tofu back to the pan and add the kung pao sauce and fry for a couple of minutes
In a small bowl mix 2 tsp cornstarch and 1 tbsp water
Add the cornstach mix to the pan and stir for a couple of minutes
Serve with sliced green onion and peanuts
Enjoy
suggestions: Serve with rice or noddles

title: Black bean cream soup
steps: In a pot with oil fry onion,garlic and red bell pepper until softened
Add smoked paprika, cumin, oregano,  and salt and sauté for a couple of minutes.
Add the beans and vegetable broth and cook for 15 min
In blender add the soup and oat/soy cream. Then mix well
Enjoy
suggestions: Serve with slices of jalapeno chilli

title: Quinoa kale lentils salad
steps: Combine the  quinoa, lentils and  vegetables in a bowl.
Add soy sauce, juice of one lemon, minced garlic  and ground pepper
Mix well the salad
Enjoy

title: Roasted carrots hummus
steps: Preheat oven 220 °C
In a baking tray with parchment paper spread the diced carrots, and season with  olive oil and 1 tsp salt.
Roast the carrots for 30 min until carrots are tender
In a blender add garlic,chickpeas,dill sesame oil, tahini 1 tsp salt and lemon juice. Mix well
Remove the carrots from the oven, wait a bit to cool down. Then add it to the blender and mix until smooth
Serve the hummus with fresh coriander and cumin
Enjoy
suggestions: Add some chipotle chilli sauce for a smoky spicy flavour

title: Roasted tomato coconut soup
ingredients: 500 gr pounds of roma tomatoes, sliced in half
steps: Preheat oven 220 °C
In a baking tray with parchment paper spread the garlic, tomatoes,sweet onion and season with  olive oil, 2 tsp black pepper and 2 tsp salt.
Roast the vegetables for approximately 30 min
In a blender add the roasted vegetables, coconut milk, vegetable broth, masala and 2 tsp salt. Mix well
Add the mix to a pot and cook in medium-heat for 10 min
Enjoy
suggestions: Add some chipotle chilli sauce for a smoky spicy flavour

title: Chickpea beetroot curry
ingredients: 1 small piece ginger (3 cm), peeled and grated
steps: In a large pot boil water and add the rice, cook for 25 min
Meanwhile the rice is cooking fry in a pan for 5 min onion, garlic and ginger
Add tumeric,coriander and cumin  and fry for a couple of minutes
Add the vegetable stock and tomatoes. Bring to boil and then add the beetroot, chickpeas and carrot
Reduce the heat to medium-heat and cook for another 15 minutes.
Then add coconut milk and cook for 5 minutes
Serve the curry with rice
Enjoy
suggestions: Add some chipotle chilli sauce for a smoky spicy flavour

title: Baba Ganoush
steps: Preheat oven 200 °C
In a baking tray with parchment paper spread the garlic and eggplants
Drizzle the garlic and eggplants with olive oil
Roast the eggplants for approximately 30 min
Remove the eggpplants from the oven, let them cool down for a while and then peel them
In a blender add  roasted eggplants, roasted garlic,cumin,salt and tahini, Mix well
Serve the baba ganoush with a pinch of smoked paprika and some extra virgin olive oil
Enjoy
suggestions: Add some chilli powder while mixing the ingredients for a spicy flavour

title: Red lentil butternut squash curry stew
ingredients: 4 cups butternut squash chopped and cooked
steps: In a big pot over low-medium heat add olive oil and fry the onion, kale and garlic for 5 min
Add curry and sautee for a couple of min. Then add the vegetable broth and lentils.Bring to boil and then reduce the heat and cook for 15 min
Add the butternut squash
Cook for 10 min. Season the stew with salt, black pepper and ginger powder
Enjoy
suggestions: Eat with rice

title: Sundried tomato couscous salad
steps: Boil the water and pour it in a bowl with couscous and salt.Cover the bowl  with cling film or a lid. Wait for 10 min till the couscous is cooked
For the dressing in a  small bowl add red wine vinegar, mustard, garlic, lemon juice olive oil and dried basil. Mix well and store in the friedge
When the couscous is ready, add it in a large bowl.Add also the dried tomatoes, spinach. Mix all the ingredients
Season the salad with the dressing
Enjoy
suggestions: Add toasted almonds to the salad

title: Cauliflower cream soup
steps: Add in medium-heat olive oil and fry onion and garlic.Season with 1 tsp salt and 1 tsp black pepper
Add carrots,cauliflower and potato, saute for 5 min. Then add the flour and fry for 5 more minutes
Add vegetable broth, almond milk, nutritional yeast and 1 tsp salt. Bring to boil and reduce the heat. Cook for 20 minutes
Season the soup with 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp black pepper and lemon juice
With an immersion blender puree the soup
Enjoy

title: Chocolate hummus
ingredients: 1/4 cup cocoa powder or raw cacao powder
steps: Add all ingredients to a bowl
With an immersion blender puree all the ingredients until smooth
Enjoy

title: Vegan nuggets
steps: In a food processor add the cauliflower florets,black beans, carrots and onion and blend it until smooth
Add the cauliflower mix to a frying pan and cook for 10 min. Add garlic and cook for a couple of minutes
Set aside the mix and add yeast and yeast extract. Mix well
Put the mix in the fridge and wait for 40 min
Meanwhile heat the oven to 230 C. Place a backing paper sheet in a tray. Drizzle olive oil to the baking paper
Place the breadcrumb and 100 gr of chickpea flour in different place
In a small bowl mix 70 gr chickpea flour with water
Take the cauliflower mix from the friedge. Take a small amount of the mix and make small nuggets
Dip the nugget in the chickpea flour plate, then in the chickpea batter  and  in the breadcrumb plate.
Place the nugget in the tray, repeat until the cauliflower mix is finished
Bake the nuggets for 15 min, take them out and flip them. Then bake for 15 more min
Enjoy
suggestions: Eat with your favorite dip

title: Broccoli cream soup
steps: Boil the water in a large pot and add broccoli. Cook for 15 min
Add the broccoli to a blender, add 1 cup of the water where the broccoli was boiled, salt, black pepper, oat/soy cream, garlic and onion
Mix well all the ingredients
Enjoy

title: Sweet Potato Peanut Soup
ingredients: 2 large sweet potato chopped in cubes
steps: In a big pot add the olive oil and onion, fry for 5 min
Add the garlic, ginger and red bell pepper, cook for a couple of minutes.
Then add tomato puree, vegetable broth. Season with  cayenne pepper, lemon juice, peanut butter, maple syrup, salt, black pepper and soy sauce. Cook and stir for 15 min
With an immersion blender mix the soup until smooth
Garnish the soup with salted peanuts
Enjoy

title: Ratatouille
steps: In frying pan over medium-heat add 2 tbsp olive oil. Fry the eggplant,season with 2 tbsp salt, cook for 8 min and set aside
In the empty frying pan add 2 tbsp olive oil, season with 2 tbsp salt and cook the zucchini for 5 min.Set aside
In the empty frying pan add 2 tbsp olive oil and cook onion, red bell pepper and garlic. Cook for 5 min
Add tomatoes, sugar, tomato puree, thyme. Cook for 10 min.
Add the cooked eggplant and zucchini. Reduce the heat to  low-heat and cook for 10 min
Serve with fresh chopped basil
Enjoy

title: Baked eggplant with peanut sauce
steps: Preheat oven 200 °C
In a baking tray with parchment paper spread the eggplants, bake for 10 min
Meanwhile in a small bowl add peanut butter, soy sauce,, 1 tbsp water chilli powder and maple syrup
Serve the baked eggplants with the peanut sauce, spring onions and sesame seeds
Enjoy

title: Roasted beetroot dip
ingredients: 1/4 cup raw walnuts, whole or chopped
steps: Preheat oven 200 °C
In a baking tray with parchment paper spread the garlic and beetroots, bake for 40 min
Let the beetroot and garlic to cool down.
In a food processor add all the ingredients, mix until smooth
Enjoy
suggestions: Serve with pita bread

title: Cooked cinammon apple
steps: In a large pot add water, apple
Boil the apples for 15 min
Sprinkle cinammon
Enjoy
suggestions: Serve with some maple syrup

title: Spicy lentil soup
ingredients: 100 gr kale   ribs removed and chopped
steps: In big pot over medium-heat fry with olive oil onions, kale and carrots, cook for 7 min
Add the garlic and season with cumin, and curry powder.Cook for 5 more min
Add the lentils, water and vegetable broth. Raised the heat to boil, then reduce the heat and cook for 20 min
Season with salt,black pepper, chilli powder and lemon juice
Enjoy

title: Grilled carrots
steps: Preheat oven 200 °C
In bowl mix maple syrup,chipotle sauce,2 tbsp salt and olive oil. Add the carrots to the mix
In a tray with baking paper spread the carrots, bake for 15 min, then transfer to a plate
Meanwhile in a small bowl mix the yogurt, lemon juice, tahini, 2 tbsp salt,water and black pepper
Serve the carrots with yogurt sauce and crushed walnuts
Enjoy

title: Quinoa Salad
ingredients: 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes sliced in half
steps: In a bowl mix quinoa, cucumber, olives and parsley leaves, cherry tomatoes and bell pepper
For preparing the dressing mix olive oil, red wine vinegar, olive oil, salt and black pepper
Add the dressing to the salad
Enjoy

title: Mushroom cream pasta
steps: In a frying pan over medium-heat add  olive oil  and fry  onion and garlic
Add  mushrooms and for 7 min. Season well with salt and pepper.
Add white wine and cook for 7 more minutes.
Add almond/soy cream and cook for 5 minutes and then add the parsley
Add the pasta to the sauce
Serve the pasta  with crushed wallnuts
Enjoy

title: Sweet potatoes Wedges
steps: Preheat the oven to 250 C
In a tray with baking paper place the sweet potatoes wedges
Drizzle olive oil and season with garlic powder, black pepper and salt
Bake for 50 min
Enjoy

title: Baked pears
steps: Preheat the oven to 250 C
In a tray with baking paper place the pears
Sprinkle the crushed walnuts
Drizzle maple syrup and season with cinnamon
Bake for 40 min
Enjoy

title: Kale chips
steps: Preheat the oven to 250 C
In a tray with baking paper place the kale
Drizzle olive oil and sprinkle with garlic powder and salt
Bake for 35 min
Enjoy

title: Spinach Lemon Hummus
steps: Add the chickpeas,garlic,lemon juice,spinach,cumin, a big pinch of salt, pepper and olive oil to a food processor
Blend until well combined
Taste and add if neccesary more lemon juice, pepper or salt
Enjoy
suggestions: If the hummus is a bit dry, add a bit of water while blending the ingredients

title: Portobello chipotle tacos
steps: In a small bowl mix chipotle sauce, olive oil, cumin, coriander and garlic
Add the portobello mushrooms to the small bowl and marinate
In a frying pan over medium-heat fry the portobello mushrooms till tender and season with salt
Warm the tortillas and serve the tacos with portobello mushrooms, red bell pepper and black beans
Enjoy

title: Vegan balls
steps: Preheat oven 200 °C
In a frying pan over medium-heat add  olive oil  and fry  onion and garlic, saute for 5 min
In a blender add all the ingredients. Mix well
With the dough make small balls and refrigerate for 15 min
In a frying pan over medium-heat sautee the balls for 3 min
Place the balls to a try with baking paper and cook for 20 min
Enjoy

title: Pea soup
steps: In a pot over medium-heat add  olive oil  and fry  onion and garlic, saute for 5 min
Add the peas and vegetable stock, cook for 10 min
Add the cream and puree the ingredients with a hand blender
season with salt and black pepper
Enjoy
